hero.headline: Neutral infrastructure for digital identity with holder consent
hero.subheadline: We connect issuers, verifiers, and users without centralizing data. Companies reduce verification costs; users maintain sovereignty over their credentials.

product.title: What we do
product.description: Ultima Forma provides an orchestration layer that connects credential issuers, verifiers, and identity wallets. Users store credentials in sovereign wallets and decide what to share. Companies perform verifications via API, always with explicit and granular consent.

feature1.title: Neutral orchestration
feature1.desc: We connect the ecosystem without centralizing data. The choice remains with issuers, verifiers, and holders.

feature2.title: Sovereign wallet
feature2.desc: Credentials under user control. Decentralized storage and minimum necessary sharing.

feature3.title: Interoperability
feature3.desc: Open standards ensure credentials and flows work beyond a single provider.

pedro.name: Pedro Drummond
pedro.description: Expert in digital identification and identity resolution with Big Data, applied in high-criticality government environments (Federal Police, ABIN, Central Bank of Brazil, Attorney General's Office). Expertise in governance, data quality, deduplication, matching and auditing, with sensitivity to security and privacy constraints.

yuri.name: Yuri Lima

walletStory.title: Daniel didn’t upload a single PDF to finance his new home.
walletStory.subtitle: With one consent click, the bank received authentic, verified, and up-to-date documents.
walletStory.scene1: Buying a home used to mean scanning, uploading, renaming, and resending documents.
walletStory.scene2: Now, his verified identity lives securely in his wallet.
walletStory.scene3: He sees exactly what will be shared. He taps Authorize.
walletStory.scene4: The bank receives structured, cryptographically signed credentials — not PDFs.
walletStory.consentMessage: Bank requests verified identity and income credentials.
walletStory.final: No uploads. No fraud. No delays.
walletStory.cred4: No centralized storage of personal data
